main_definition: To initiate or begin an action, process, event, or activity.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To commence or begin a particular task or event.
meanings_and_examples.example: The game starts at 7 PM sharp.

meanings_and_examples.definition: When something is the beginning of a series or sequence, often referring to order or chronology.
To take control or responsibility for leading an activity or project.
meanings_and_examples.example: She starts as the new manager tomorrow.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In sports, to signal the commencement of a game by throwing the ball into play.
meanings_and_examples.example: The referee throws in the ball at the start of the match.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To initiate an action or process with little delay; promptly.
meanings_and_examples.example: He starts his presentation without any introduction.
